data.eml:eml: Tonsuritermes, a new soldierless termite genus and two new species from South America (Blattaria: Isoptera: Termitidae: Apicotermitinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Constantini, Joice P., Carrijo, Tiago Fernandes, Palma-Onetto, Valeria, Scheffrahn, Rudolf, Carnohan, Lucas Paul, Šobotník, Jan, Cancello, Eliana M. (2018): Tonsuritermes, a new soldierless termite genus and two new species from South America (Blattaria: Isoptera: Termitidae: Apicotermitinae). Zootaxa 4531 (3): 383-394, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4531.3.4
